data.title: ‘Godfather of AI’ says Bill Gates and Elon Musk are right about the future of work—but he predicts mass unemployment is on its way
data.description: While tech leaders paint a positive future where work is optional thanks to AI, the ‘Godfather of AI’ Geoffrey Hinton warns they’re “betting on AI replacing a lot of workers.”
data.keywords: Geoffrey Hinton, Senator Bernie Sanders, Bill Gates, Silicon Valley, Jensen Huang, Elon Musk
